alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued December 16 at 12:32PM CST until December 16 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southeastern St. Louis County in northeastern Minnesota... Eastern Carlton County in northeastern Minnesota... Southwestern Lake County in northeastern Minnesota... Northwestern Douglas County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1230 PM CST, a dangerous snow squall was located near French River, or 18 miles northeast of Superior, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Poor visibility to near one quarter of a mile in heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous travel. Roads will become snow covered. Locations impacted include... Superior, Cloquet, Hermantown, Two Harbors, Proctor, Scanlon, Carlton, Mahtowa, Barnum, Wrenshall, Oliver, Holyoke, Thomson, Brookston, Boulder Lake, Pike Lake Near Duluth, Wisconsin Point, City of Rice Lake, Nemadji, and Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents. Do not use cruise control in winter driving conditions.
